channel.title: Bukkit server has been shutdown
channel.description:
We are turning off the bukkit server due to inactivity and lack of plugin updates. We also feel the server resources could be better utilized in another manner.
If you want to download the worlds there's a torrent attached to this post.
(torrent file is compressed to bypass attachment permissions)
If you need help with decompressing 7z read https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586125.0.html

item.title: Bukkit server has been shutdown

I’ll post a direct link after it’s done uploading.

edit: Here’s the link for direct download.

item.title: Bukkit server has been shutdown
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

I was assuming you or mitb didn’t want to upload it because of bandwidth reasons, but my server has a lot of that and is mostly underutilised so if you had a way of getting it to me as a 1-time download that’d work.

Read full topic

item.title: Bukkit server has been shutdown
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:8, topic:539487”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=658326.msg4403669#msg4403669 date=1391243287]

[quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=658326.msg4403668#msg4403668 date=1391243218]

[quote author=zuppers link=topic=658326.msg4403564#msg4403564 date=1391214609]

[quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=658326.msg4403546#msg4403546 date=1391211984]
i can provide a direct mirror if someone sends me the file. i can’t torrent and i imagine a lot of other british cant torrent either.
[/quote]Why can’t you torrent?
[/quote]blocked by my isp
[/quote]All torrenting is blocked by your isp…?
[/quote]yes all torrenting is blocked by my isp. my old isp used to just send me threatening letters whenever i torrented, and throttle my internet to 100kbps. welcome to the uk!![/quote]I guess you’re out of luck unless someone wants to create a direct link or… http://www.forceflow.be/2010/12/22/dealing-with-bittorrent-traffic-shapingblocking-by-your-isp/

Read full topic
